section.p: Data collected for relevant parameters of tissue concentrations of anylytes.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the pharmacokinetics parameter result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PPTESTCD, PPTEST]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the pharacokinetics parameter result. [SDTM: PPSEQ] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: PPSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD
The pharmacokinetics parameter result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: PPORRES, PPORRESU, PPSTRESC, PPSTRESN, PPSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to capture information about the specimen used as the direct subject of the test.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.67)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the finding is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] pharmacokineticsParameterCategory with data type pharmacokinetics Parameter Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the finding is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] pharmacokineticsParameterSubCategory with data type pharmacokinetics Parameter Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Orients the performance of the test leading to the pharmacokinetic parameter with respect to a study defined timepoint.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.74)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the pharacokinetics parameter result. [SDTM: PPSEQ] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the pharmacokinetics parameter result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PPTESTCD, PPTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: PPSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD
The pharmacokinetics parameter result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: PPORRES, PPORRESU, PPSTRESC, PPSTRESN, PPSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.67)
Used to capture information about the specimen used as the direct subject of the test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the finding is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] pharmacokineticsParameterCategory with data type pharmacokinetics Parameter Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the finding is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] pharmacokineticsParameterSubCategory with data type pharmacokinetics Parameter Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.74)
Orients the performance of the test leading to the pharmacokinetic parameter with respect to a study defined timepoint.
